document.full_text: former president manuel zelaya returned to honduras on saturday after being exiled by the army two years ago in a coup, clearing the way for the nation to normalize relations with its neighbors in the americas.
document.title: ex-honduran president zelaya returns from exile
lines_and_colors: former president manuel zelaya returned to honduras on saturday after being exiled by the army two years ago in a coup, clearing the way for the nation to normalize relations with its neighbors in the americas.
